attributes.action: Recognise that throwaway attitude to cars is increadibly wastefull and evironmentally damaging by reducing or even exmpting VED on cars owned for more than 10 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is a well established fact that the envirnmental impact of any motorcar is many times that it causes during a ten yaur life span. 

Car drivers that use a car till its natural life has eneded should be rewarded by a reduction or exepmtion from paying VED once their ownership has reached ten years continious ownership. If the car is sold after that then it becomes eligible for VED once more. 

Once a car has reached 25 years of age then the historic VED class should be applied regarless
